Function.Description: Returns a specific number of characters from a text string, starting at the position you specify, based on the number of characters you specify.

Property.Description: The string that you want to extract the charachters from.
Property.Name: String

Property.Description: The position of the first character you want to extract in String. The first character has a StartNum of 1.
Property.Name: StartNum

Property.Description: The number of characters that you want to return.
Property.Name: NumChars

Function.Name: SubString
